page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: { {Housing}estates of Penrith-Council and privately owned.{Education}at infant and junior schools.{Residential} building taking place & planned at Carleton.Local main roads A6,A66,M6. { {Law & Order}Cumbria Police H.Q. Carleton Hall.{Health Care}at Penrith New Hospital, Health Centre. Ambulance Station & Fire Station,Greengarth Home for elderly in Bridge Lane.{Recreation Penrith Rugby Union F.C.inc.Squash & Tennis Clubs. Eamont Bridge includes houses, hotel, pub, farms, businesses. {Local History}Brougham Castle & King Arthur's Round Table.{Farming} important to{employment.}Grassland feeds dairy & beef cattle.Annual Penrith Show_livestock,farm products and machinery,rural crafts,show jumping,sheepdog trials. Modern sewage works.
